XPSPLprocessoreventError¶

Error

Event used for errors which have occured during processor operation.

Methods¶

__construct¶

__construct()¶

Generates a new error event.

Parameters:Multiple (array) – param values (UNEXPECTED)
Return type:void

get_error_data¶

get_error_data()¶

Returns the data associated with the error.

Return type:mixed
